rows.label: tlk4140002802_msg0001
rows.name:
You helped us back then...
Thank you. Thanks to you,
I was able to live without regrets.

rows.label: tlk4140002802_msg0002
rows.name:
After I came back, my father got
really angry at me, but...
he approved of my marriage to Norman-san!

rows.label: tlk4140002802_msg0003
rows.name:
It seems my attempt to elope showed him
how serious I was.

rows.label: tlk4140002802_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm glad I had the courage
to come back to Torigoth.
